code: import{RECEIVE_MARKERS,RECEIVE_MARKER}from"../actions/marker_action";var MarkersReducer=function MarkersReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{all:{},new:undefined};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;Object.freeze(state);var newState=Object.assign({},state);switch(action.type){case RECEIVE_MARKERS:newState.all=action.markers.data;return newState;case RECEIVE_MARKER:newState.new=action.marker.data;return newState;default:return state;}};export default MarkersReducer;
